snippet.title: Edge Of Sanity - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
See some of the eldritch horrors that await in this latest Edge Of Sanity trailer, along with the release date reveal for this upcoming Cthulhu-inspired, 2D survival horror game set in the unforgiving lands of Alaska. Edge of Sanity will be available on PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch on September 13, 2024.

In Edge of Sanity, uncover a disturbing story while madness claws at your mind. Lead a group of survivors and explore, scavenge, and survive together - against untold eldritch horrors.

#EdgeOfSanity #Gaming #Games
